SYSTEM: OWL.pdf: PÃ¡gina 22
Web Ontology Language
OWL semantics
No UNA + OWA:
Building an ontology in OWL is like pruning a space in which 
by default everything is possible (OWA) and all the entities 
are the same (!UNA) 
Such prunning is performed by adding axioms that limit the 
possible facts and make entities different to each other
!!!
speaker: SYSTEM
